title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Aug. 9
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Aug. 9
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses Chart of the Day "What growth stocks and bond volatility have in common."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
